markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Experienced Professional](/Feats.aspx?ID=778) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 261 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

You carefully safeguard your professional endeavors to prevent disaster. When you use Lore to Earn Income, if you roll a critical failure, you instead get a failure. If you’re an expert in Lore, you gain twice as much income from a failed check to Earn Income, unless it was originally a critical failure.
name: Experienced Professional

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Experienced Professional Source Core Rulebook pg. 261 4.0 Prerequisites Trained in Lore --- You carefully safeguard your professional endeavors to prevent disaster. When you use Lore to Earn Income, if you roll a critical failure, you instead get a failure. If you’re an expert in Lore, you gain twice as much income from a failed check to Earn Income, unless it was originally a critical failure.
